mapper.sql: id , tenant_id, franchisee_id, profit_sharing_config_id, account, receiver_type, receiver_name, receiver_status, scale, del_flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, franchisee_id, profit_sharing_config_id, account, receiver_type, receiver_name, receiver_status, scale, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_profit_sharing_receiver_config where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_profit_sharing_receiver_config(tenant_id, franchisee_id, profit_sharing_config_id, account, receiver_type, receiver_name, receiver_status, scale, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{franchiseeId}, #{profitSharingConfigId}, #{account}, #{receiverType}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverStatus}, #{scale}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_profit_sharing_receiver_config(tenant_id, franchisee_id, profit_sharing_config_id, account, receiver_type, receiver_name, receiver_status, scale, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.franchiseeId}, #{entity.profitSharingConfigId}, #{entity.account}, #{entity.receiverType}, #{entity.receiverName}, #{entity.receiverStatus}, #{entity.scale}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into t_profit_sharing_receiver_config(tenant_id, franchisee_id, profit_sharing_config_id, account, receiver_type, receiver_name, receiver_status, scale, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.franchiseeId}, #{entity.profitSharingConfigId}, #{entity.account}, #{entity.receiverType}, #{entity.receiverName}, #{entity.receiverStatus}, #{entity.scale}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), franchisee_id = values(franchisee_id), profit_sharing_config_id = values(profit_sharing_config_id), account = values(account), receiver_type = values(receiver_type), receiver_name = values(receiver_name), receiver_status = values(receiver_status), scale = values(scale), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update t_profit_sharing_receiver_config
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
profit_sharing_config_id = #{profitSharingConfigId},
account = #{account},
receiver_type = #{receiverType},
receiver_name = #{receiverName},
receiver_status = #{receiverStatus},
scale = #{scale},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
